issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Hi guys,
when I add searchView/searchBar to Ti.UI.View and set parameter search to a tableview, my app crashes without any error in console. Is there a workaround to place searchView/searchBar outside table? I can;t use native Action Bar - I hide it and creates custom on my own. Thank you
fields.summary: App crash with searchBar added to view
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio 4.7.0
Ti SDK 5.4.0
Mac OSX El Capitan

comments.body: Hello, We need a sample code to regenerate the issue for testing. Please provide the code and a list of steps to follow. Thanks.
